title: Commencement of business
Descreption: Invested shareholders must confirm payment and office address

title: Auditor Appointment
Descreption: Company informs new auditor and submits ADT.1 form to ROC.

title: DIN eKYC
Descreption: Directors share personal information for identification & verification

title: DPT-3
Descreption: Companies report money taken from people to ROC; auditors confirm details.

title: MCA Form AOC-4
Descreption: It'spenaltyFees like an official report card for a company's documents

title: MCA Form MGT-7
Descreption: Companies must annually report activities and finances to the registrar.
